data.title: Sonya Hartnett
data.meta_description: Pp. vi +188+ 10 blanks and advertisements ; boards a trifle sprung; dust wrapper; text block browned; Viking, Melbourne, 2002. First edition. *Signed by the author on the title page. Winner of Commonwealth Writers Prize South east Asia and South Pacific region Best Book, and The Age Book of the Year in the 2003; also shortlisted for the Miles Franklin Award. Item #156002
data.text:
Hartnett, Sonya

OF A BOY.

Pp. [vi]+188+[10](blanks and advertisements); boards a trifle sprung; dust wrapper; text block browned; Viking, Melbourne, 2002. First edition. *Signed by the author on the title page. Winner of Commonwealth Writers Prize (South east Asia and South Pacific region) Best Book, and The Age Book of the Year in the 2003; also shortlisted for the Miles Franklin Award. Item #156002
